esimIntro.title: Still buying physical SIM cards?
esimIntro.description: That’s old-school! Meet the eSIM — a smart digital SIM already built into your phone that lets you activate mobile data instantly without buying or changing any physical SIM cards. No shops, no plastic, no swapping — just scan, connect, and enjoy fast, reliable internet in seconds. With Simfinity, staying online while traveling becomes effortless, flexible, and 100% hassle-free.

WhatIsEsim.heroTittle: What is an eSIM — and why travelers love it
WhatIsEsim.herodes: An eSIM is a digital SIM built directly into your phone. No physical card. No swapping. No store visits. Just scan, activate, and you’re online instantly. With an eSIM, you can stay connected the moment you land — without paying expensive roaming fees or searching for a local SIM shop. Simfinity eSIMs make travel simple: fast activation, affordable data, and global coverage in minutes.

items.question: After getting an eSIM, do I need to turn anything on?
items.answer: No, your eSIM will activate automatically when you reach your destination. Just make sure the eSIM is installed and mobile data is enabled.

items.question: Does Simfinity detect when I arrive at my destination?
items.answer: Yes. Simfinity automatically detects your arrival and activates your data plan instantly.

items.question: Do I keep my phone number with an eSIM?
items.answer: Yes. Your physical SIM stays active for calls and SMS, while the eSIM is used only for data.

items.question: What is the best eSIM for international travel?
items.answer: Simfinity offers affordable, reliable eSIM plans in 200+ destinations with instant activation and no roaming shock.

items.question: What is a tourist eSIM?
items.answer: A tourist eSIM is a digital SIM designed for travelers, allowing instant mobile data without buying a physical SIM.

items.question: How long does it take to activate an eSIM?
items.answer: Activation is instant after installation or automatically when you arrive at your destination.

features.title: Travel-friendly prices
features.description: Get super-affordable eSIM data anywhere in the world. From short trips to long adventures — Simfinity always gives you the lowest travel data cost.

features.title: Activate in seconds
features.description: No stores, no swapping cards. Just scan your Simfinity eSIM and boom — you’re connected instantly when you land.

features.title: Zero roaming shock
features.description: Stop paying crazy roaming charges. Simfinity keeps your bill predictable, clean, and budget-friendly every time you travel.

features.title: One eSIM for every trip
features.description: Keep the same Simfinity eSIM forever. Just add new country plans anytime — no need to reinstall or change SIMs again.

features.title: Smart data alerts
features.description: We notify you before your data runs out — so you never get stuck without internet in the middle of your trip.

features.title: Global & regional plans
features.description: Whether you're traveling to one country or exploring multiple regions, Simfinity has plans that fit your journey perfectly.

NewSimfinDes.title: Instant connection, zero travel stress, only with Simfinity
NewSimfinDes.des: Traveling should be fun, not frustrating. Simfinity keeps you online instantly, anywhere.

card1.title: Never ask ‘WiFi password?’ again
card1.des: Simfinity keeps you online from the moment you land — no searching for cafés, no begging for hotspots, and no relying on slow public WiFi.

card2.title: No more SIM card drama
card2.des: Skip the hassle of finding SIM shops, swapping tiny cards, or carrying ejector pins. With Simfinity eSIM, everything is digital — activate once, travel freely, and enjoy stress-free connectivity on every trip.

card3.title: Travel with privacy, powered by Simfinity
card3.des: Whether you're booking hotels, using public WiFi, or exploring new cities, your data stays protected with Simfinity. Every eSIM connection is encrypted, secure, and keeps your online activity private — no matter which country you visit. Travel freely knowing your connection is always safe.

NewSimfinWorkDes.subTitle: Why Simfinity stands out
NewSimfinWorkDes.title: A smarter choice for global travelers
NewSimfinWorkDes.des: More coverage, better prices, and features that actually make sense.

card1.title: Better value for every trip
card1.des: Simfinity gives you the lowest travel data costs with no hidden fees — perfect for short trips, business travel, and long adventures.

card2.title: Coverage that reaches further
card2.des: We partner with top networks worldwide to give you stronger, faster data even in remote or challenging locations.

card3.title: Designed for real travelers
card3.des: Built for tourists, backpackers, business flyers, digital nomads, and global movers — Simfinity keeps you connected wherever your journey takes you.

DownloadAppSection.title: The Simfinity app is almost here
DownloadAppSection.des: A smarter, faster way to manage your eSIM — launching soon on iOS and Android.

faqs.question: After getting an eSIM, do I need to turn anything on?
faqs.answer: No, your eSIM will activate automatically when you reach your destination. However, make sure your device is eSIM-compatible and that you've installed the eSIM profile before traveling. You can also manually activate it in your device settings if needed.

faqs.question: Does Simfinity detect when I arrive at my destination?
faqs.answer: Yes! Simfinity automatically detects when you arrive at your destination and activates your data plan. This means you don't have to worry about manually turning on your eSIM - it will start working as soon as you land.

faqs.question: Do I keep my number with a Simfinity eSIM data plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can keep your original phone number. Simfinity provides data-only eSIM plans, so your physical SIM card with your regular number stays active for calls and texts. You'll use the eSIM only for mobile data while traveling.

faqs.question: What's the best eSIM for international travel?
faqs.answer: Simfinity offers competitive eSIM plans for international travel with coverage in over 150 countries. We provide affordable prices, reliable connectivity, and easy setup. You can choose from various data packages (1GB to unlimited) depending on your travel needs and duration.

faqs.question: What is a tourist eSIM?
faqs.answer: A tourist eSIM is a digital SIM card designed specifically for travelers. It allows you to get mobile data in foreign countries without needing to buy a physical SIM card. You can purchase, install, and activate it entirely through an app, making it perfect for short trips and vacation stays.

faqs.question: How long does it take to activate my eSIM?
faqs.answer: Your eSIM can be activated instantly after purchase. The setup process takes just a few minutes through the Simfinity app. Once installed, your plan will activate when you reach your destination or 30 days after purchase, whichever comes first.

Referfriend.title: One device. Unlimited travel freedom
Referfriend.des: IA full year of unlimited global data, long battery life, and a smart travel device built to keep you connected anywhere.

features.description: Simfinity has 24/7 chat support for all users. And if you ever run into problems, your dedicated account manager will be there to help you solve your issues ASAP.

heroSection.title: eSIM: What is it, and how does it work?
heroSection.description: An eSIM is a digital SIM that's built into most modern phones. It works like a physical SIM card, but without having to insert anything into your device. eSIMs offer tons of benefits, such as helping you avoid roaming fees and making it easy to switch between providers.

whatIsEsimSection.heading: What is an eSIM — and why travelers love it?
whatIsEsimSection.des: An eSIM is a digital SIM built directly into your phone. No physical card. No

content.paragraph: An eSIM is an embedded subscriber identity module — essentially, a built-in chip in your phone. It does everything a traditional SIM would do, but without having to slot a tiny card into your phone. Additionally, an eSIM allows you to use several carriers and phone numbers at once, which is super convenient.
eSIMs are available on smartphones, tablets, smartwatches, and even some cars! They're great for quickly switching between phone numbers and grabbing mobile data for travel.

An eSIM uses preinstalled software on your device to work just like a physical SIM. Once you activate it, you can connect to a cell network, make calls, and use mobile data. Most modern phones will have built-in eSIMs, but check our list of eSIM-compatible phones to see if yours does.
To start using an eSIM, just buy an eSIM plan and complete a quick setup. No need to remove your current SIM card — it can stay where it is, whether you decide to keep using it or not.

faqs.question: What does an eSIM card do?
faqs.answer: An eSIM is a digital version of a physical SIM card. It connects you to a mobile network, allowing you to make calls, send texts, and use mobile data. Instead of having to insert it into your device, you just need to buy an eSIM plan from a provider and activate it.

faqs.question: How can I get an eSIM?
faqs.answer: You can get an eSIM from any reputable eSIM provider, typically by making an online purchase. For example, Simfinity offers eSIMs in over 200 destinations — just find the country you want to use your data in and pick a plan.

faqs.question: Is eSIM better than a SIM card?
faqs.answer: In short — yes. eSIMs are built into your phone, so you no longer need to open it up to insert a tiny card. These virtual cards are great for switching between providers and for international travel. Without a SIM card slot, phones can be made smaller or have improved features (like a larger battery). Here's a more detailed comparison of an eSIM vs. a physical SIM.

faqs.question: Why would I want an eSIM?
faqs.answer: You may want to get an eSIM for many reasons, like going abroad or needing extra mobile data to use in your home country. For example, if you're heading to a country where you can't get free roaming, buying an eSIM data plan can be an easy solution that won't break the bank. Simfinity offers plans from 1GB to 20GB (with unlimited plans coming soon!), so you can buy as little or as much data as you need. Alternatively, you may want to get an eSIM because you've seen a great eSIM offer and want to take advantage of it. You don't need to be going abroad to use it — eSIMs provide an excellent affordable mobile data option wherever you are.

faqs.question: Why are eSIMs not popular?
faqs.answer: eSIM technology is still quite new — the first eSIM-compatible smartphone was only released in 2016. Not many people know about eSIMs yet, and those who do typically use them with wearable and IoT devices only. That said, their popularity is growing as more people find out about eSIM benefits. We think they'll become a lot more popular soon.

faqs.question: Is an eSIM safer than a SIM?
faqs.answer: Yes, in some ways. A physical SIM card can be damaged, lost, or stolen — especially if you're swapping out cards on your travels. eSIMs are electronic and built into your device, so you can't damage or lose them. They can't be stolen either (unless you're really unlucky and someone steals your device).

faqs.question: Does an eSIM give you a phone number?
faqs.answer: Not always. Some eSIMs (like the ones you can buy through the Simfinity app) only offer mobile data without a phone number, because you can do so much with data alone these days. You can make video calls, chat, browse, and stream without a phone number. However, some other providers give you a phone number with an eSIM.

faqs.question: Does an eSIM work without an internet connection?
faqs.answer: Yes, an eSIM can work without an internet connection. For example, with some eSIMs, you may be able to make cellular (voice) calls or send texts (SMS). What you can do with your eSIM depends on your eSIM plan and the provider you choose. It's worth pointing out that right now, the eSIMs you can buy from Simfinity don't give you a phone number or let you make voice calls without an internet connection. Instead, they give you data to connect to the internet, allowing you to make calls, send messages, and browse the web through communication apps.

faqs.question: Does an eSIM drain your phone battery?
faqs.answer: Battery drain is not an issue with eSIMs, at least not more than with physical SIM cards. If your device has been using more battery power lately, it's likely caused by other apps on your phone.

faqs.question: Can you convert an eSIM back to a physical SIM?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can convert an eSIM back to a physical SIM — for example, if you want to use it with an older phone model. However, it's best to pop into your network provider's store to speak to an advisor and pick up a new SIM card.

tabs.label: Advantages
tabs.heading: eSIM advantages
tabs.subheading: eSIMs are the future of connectivity. Here are the main eSIM benefits.

items.title: No high roaming fees
items.description: Travelers can buy eSIMs that connect them to local carriers and avoid unexpected roaming fees.

items.title: Multiple profiles
items.description: You can have multiple virtual eSIMs on one device, making it easy to switch between different carriers and phone numbers.

items.title: Pay for what you need
items.description: Off to Japan for a week? Get a 7-day plan instead of monthly, and save your yen for an extra okonomiyaki.

items.title: Saves space
items.description: The absence of a physical SIM card slot frees up space for other device upgrades (like a bigger battery or more handset features).

items.title: Can't get lost or stolen
items.description: Swapping out tiny SIM cards is tricky, especially if you're on the move. An eSIM is built in, so it won't get lost or stolen.

items.title: Less waste
items.description: A single plastic SIM won't destroy the planet, but getting a newly packaged SIM card for every trip adds up over time. Use an eSIM instead.

tabs.label: Disadvantages
tabs.heading: eSIM disadvantages
tabs.subheading: Just like everything else, eSIMs have some drawbacks.

items.title: Not all devices support eSIMs
items.description: While most modern phones are eSIM compatible, if you're using an older model, you may be out of luck.

items.title: Unfamiliar technology
items.description: If you're new to eSIMs, you might find the activation process a bit more complex than simply inserting a SIM card.

items.title: Not easy to switch devices
items.description: Moving your eSIM to a different device involves more steps than just swapping a physical SIM card.

EsimVsSimComparison.heading: What is the difference between an eSIM and a physical SIM?
EsimVsSimComparison.description: The main difference between an eSIM and a traditional SIM card is that an eSIM is digital while a SIM card is a physical chip
EsimVsSimComparison.footerNote: *Simfinity is all about mobile data right now, so we don't support phone numbers yet. Don't worry — we're working on it.

rows.esim: Manual or automatic (plan activates at your destination)
rows.sim: Manual (need to insert a card into your device)

rows.esim: Affordable — easy to get data plans for different countries
rows.sim: May be expensive due to roaming

features.title: Works on all smartphones that support eSIM
features.description: Works on all smartphones that support eSIM

heroSection.title: eSIM: What is it, and how does it work?
heroSection.description: An eSIM is a digital SIM that's built into most modern phones. It works like a physical SIM card, but without having to insert anything into your device. eSIMs offer tons of benefits, such as helping you avoid roaming fees and making it easy to switch between providers.
heroSection.imageAlt: Woman using eSIM on mobile phone

activationSection.title: How to activate your Simfinity eSIM plan
activationSection.description: Your Simfinity eSIM plan will activate automatically. After you install the eSIM on your device and leave for your destination within 30 days, the data plan will activate automatically as soon as you arrive.
activationSection.imageAlt: Group of friends using eSIM on phones

benefitsSection.heading: What are the benefits of using an eSIM app?
benefitsSection.subheading: Using eSIMs over physical SIM cards provides all kinds of benefits:

benefits.title: Easy to use
benefits.description: Just download the app, log in, and buy a data plan. Easy!

benefits.title: Avoid roaming charges
benefits.description: It's the easiest way to avoid sneaky roaming fees.

benefits.title: One eSIM for all travel
benefits.description: Add new destinations to your existing Simfinity eSIM through the Simfinity app — no new eSIMs needed.

ctaSections.heading: Get an eSIM data plan
ctaSections.description: If you have any questions, our team is available via chat 24/7 on the Simfinity app. You can also send us an email if you have a more detailed question.

ctaSections.heading: Refer a friend and earn Simfinity credit!
ctaSections.description: Each referral earns you US$5 in Simfinity credits while your pals get a US$5 discount on their first plan!

setupTabs.label: On iPhone
setupTabs.title: Set up an eSIM on your iPhone with the Simfinity app

steps.stepTitle: Pick an eSIM data plan for your trip
steps.description: Select the country you're heading to and choose a plan.
Get the app, tap Install eSIM, and follow the steps on the screen.
Get ready for your trip — your plan will activate when you arrive.

instructions.heading: Set up an eSIM manually on your iPhone
steps: Scan the QR code or enter the details manually.

setupTabs.label: On Android
setupTabs.title: Set up an eSIM on your Android with the Simfinity app

steps.stepTitle: Pick an eSIM data plan for your trip
steps.description: Select the country you're heading to and choose a plan.
Get the app, tap Install eSIM and follow the steps on the screen.
Get ready for your trip — your plan will activate when you arrive.

instructions.heading: Set up an eSIM manually on your Android
steps: Tap "Scan the QR code" or choose another way to add your eSIM.

faqs.question: Is my phone compatible with eSIMs?
faqs.answer: If you got a new smartphone in the last few years, it should be compatible with eSIMs. Most smartphones released after 2020 are. However, even a new device might not support eSIMs if it was bought in a certain location, such as mainland China. To know for sure, check the list of eSIM-compatible devices.

faqs.question: How to manually install an eSIM on your phone?
faqs.answer: You can manually install and set up eSIMs on your phone by scanning the QR code from your carrier or going to "Network settings" and looking for an option to add a new eSIM.

faqs.question: Can I use an eSIM without the app?
faqs.answer: You can buy a Simfinity eSIM plan without the app, but you'll need to download the Simfinity app to install the eSIM.

faqs.question: How long does it take to activate an eSIM?
faqs.answer: Activating an eSIM means adding the eSIM profile to your phone by either scanning the QR code or entering the information manually. This way, your phone can recognize and use the eSIM, but does not necessarily activate the data plan immediately. How long this process takes depends on the type of an eSIM you're using. While a primary eSIM can take hours or even days to activate, travel eSIMs, such as the ones that you can purchase on Simfinity, are activated almost instantly.

faqs.question: What is the best eSIM for international travel?
faqs.answer: The Simfinity eSIM is one of the best eSIMs for international travel. It's not only affordable, but you can add new destinations to your existing Simfinity eSIM and stay connected without configuring new eSIMs.

faqs.question: Are eSIMs free?
faqs.answer: Downloading our eSIM app is completely free, but the eSIM plans themselves are not. However, you can get free Simfinity credits through our referral program. By referring your friends to Simfinity, you can earn credits and use them to buy eSIM plans for your travels.

faqs.question: How to get an eSIM online
faqs.answer: The best way to get eSIMs online is to buy them through a reputable company, such as Simfinity. You can download the app and easily manage your eSIM plans.

faqs.question: Can I set up an eSIM myself?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can set up an eSIM yourself, but the instructions on how to do it may vary depending on your network provider. If you're having trouble, contact your provider for help.

card.title: Meet the people behind Simfinity
card.description: We've traveled enough to know how frustrating staying connected abroad can be. That's why we built Simfinity — the eSIM app that makes staying connected simple for everyone.

WhyBuiltSec.title: Why we built Simfinity
WhyBuiltSec.para1: People are natural explorers, and crossing the seas has always been the ultimate adventure. For many years, sailing was how they did it. Today, you may not be crossing the ocean to find a new continent, but the urge to travel and explore hasn't gone away. And that's what we're all about
WhyBuiltSec.para2: Simfinity gives you the tools to explore the world in a modern way. We're building a future where connectivity is effortless, instant, and entirely digital. No plastic. No borders. Just tap, connect, and go.

ValuesSection.heading: The values that guide us
ValuesSection.subheading: Our values aren't just inspirational words we put on a wall to look at — we live by them in everything we build.

values.title: Wander freely
values.description: We're replacing plastic SIM cards with an easy and eco-friendly solution that works in 200+ destinations.

values.title: Keep it simple
values.description: No tech jargon. No clutter. We built an eSIM app that's clean, intuitive, and easy to navigate.

values.title: Prioritize humans
values.description: We care about people, not just rigid processes. Every team member and user is treated with empathy and respect.

values.title: Always improve
values.description: We don't chase perfection — we chase progress. We believe that small wins make big shifts.

values.title: Think like a traveler
values.description: We stay curious, flexible, and open to the unknown, just like the explorers we built Simfinity for.

values.title: Make it matter
values.description: We're here to make a difference, so we focus on what truly matters — our users, team, and the world around us.

SailyTaleSection.heading: The Simfinity tale
SailyTaleSection.subheading: We envisioned a better way for travelers to stay online. Today, we're making that vision a reality for thousands around the globe. Here's how Simfinity got here.

events.title: Where it all began
events.description: The Simfinity eSIM app started with a shared idea — ditch plastic SIM cards and simplify mobile connectivity.

events.title: The first launch
events.description: We introduced our first eSIM plans that covered 160+ countries with instant mobile access and zero plastic waste.

events.title: Prioritizing security
events.description: We've added built-in security features to our eSIM app so you can browse more safely while you travel.

events.title: Connecting the world
events.description: At the start of the year, we expanded our coverage to 200+ destinations and helped more people than ever stay connected.

events.title: Connecting the world
events.description: At the start of the year, we expanded our coverage to 200+ destinations and helped more people than ever stay connected.

VoicesSection.heading: Voices of the Simfinity crew
VoicesSection.subheading: Get to know the people behind Simfinity and their vision for easier mobile connection.

testimonials.quote: Travelers are at the heart of everything we do at Simfinity. That's why every team is working on making travel connectivity smarter and smoother. We move fast and stay curious to deliver the best possible experience.
testimonials.name: Matas Čenys

testimonials.quote: Our mission is to make staying connected abroad as simple as possible. We're building a product that travelers can trust, with transparency and reliability at its core.
testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson

testimonials.quote: Innovation drives us forward. We're constantly exploring new ways to improve the travel experience through cutting-edge technology and seamless connectivity solutions.
testimonials.name: Alex Martinez

CareerCTASection.heading: Always connected. Always on course.
CareerCTASection.description: Join a team of passionate travelers shaping the future of mobile connectivity.

card.title: Growth opportunities
card.des: We support your growth with learning opportunities, real responsibilities, and chances to lead (not just follow)

card.title: Team collaboration
card.des: We work together across teams and time zones to build amazing products

card.title: Culture and community
card.des: We prioritize people and celebrate wins, milestones, and the unique contributions of every team member.

card.title: Autonomy and ownership
card.des: We trust you to lead, experiment, and bring your ideas to life. At Simfinity, everyone has freedom to make bold decisions.

card.title: Work-life balance
card.des: Work from anywhere in the world! We're a borderless team of many nationalities, connected by trust, not time zones.

heroSec.title: Safe travels with the Simfinity security features
heroSec.description: Stay connected wherever you go and protect your browsing.

Safe_travels.title: Better eSIM security — stay safer across your travels
Safe_travels.description: You don't want to run out of data because some websites use too many trackers and ads. You also shouldn't have to worry about malicious websites instead of enjoying your time abroad. Enable "Ad blocker" and "Web protection" in your eSIM settings and increase your privacy when traveling.

faqs.question: Is the Simfinity eSIM service available in {countryName}?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Simfinity offers flexible prepaid eSIM plans for {countryName}. Once you've downloaded the app and created an account, you can choose a data plan from 1 GB over 7 days, or 3 GB, 5 GB, 10 GB, or 20 GB over 30 days. You'll find great coverage in major cities and popular tourist destinations like Cancun, Playa del Carmen, {countryName} City, Guadalajara, and Puerto Vallarta.

faqs.question: How do I use an eSIM in {countryName}?
faqs.answer: Yes! Simfinity automatically detects when you arrive at your destination and activates your data plan. This means you don't have to worry about manually turning on your eSIM - it will start working as soon as you land.

faqs.question: Do I keep my number with a Simfinity eSIM data plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can keep your original phone number. Simfinity provides data-only eSIM plans, so your physical SIM card with your regular number stays active for calls and texts. You'll use the eSIM only for mobile data while traveling.

faqs.question: What's the best eSIM for international travel?
faqs.answer: 1. Start by purchasing your data plan through the Simfinity app or our website — you can choose between a 1 GB, 3 GB, 5 GB, 10 GB, or 20 GB plan. 2. Next, we recommend installing your eSIM before you leave for {countryName} — make sure you're connected to a stable Wi-Fi network and follow instructions in the Simfinity app. 3. Make sure your eSIM is turned on in your settings and that you've enabled your data. 4. Once you arrive in {countryName}, your plan will automatically activate. 5. Start browsing and enjoy your trip!

faqs.question: When will I receive my {countryName} eSIM?
faqs.answer: Whether you've purchased a Simfinity eSIM plan through the website or the app, you'll instantly be able to install your eSIM. If you bought your plan on the website, a QR code will immediately be sent to your email — just scan it and follow the on-screen instructions to set up your eSIM. If it's your first time buying a data plan through the Simfinity eSIM app, you'll be prompted to tap the "Install" button in the app — follow the on-screen instructions to set up your eSIM.

faqs.question: When will my data plan for {countryName} activate?
faqs.answer: If you've turned on your Simfinity eSIM through your device's settings and enabled roaming, your plan will automatically activate when you arrive in {countryName}. However, you don't have to use your data plan for {countryName} as soon as you buy it — you can wait for up to 30 days to get to the country. If you haven't activated the eSIM plan within 30 days, it will automatically activate and eventually expire.

faqs.question: Can I add more data to my {countryName} eSIM plan if needed?
faqs.answer: If you've turned on your Simfinity eSIM through your device's settings and enabled roaming, your plan will automatically activate when you arrive in {countryName}. However, you don't have to use your data plan for {countryName} as soon as you buy it — you can wait for up to 30 days to get to the country. If you haven't activated the eSIM plan within 30 days, it will automatically activate and eventually expire.

faqs.question: When will my data plan for {countryName} activate?
faqs.answer: If you've turned on your Simfinity eSIM through your device's settings and enabled roaming, your plan will automatically activate when you arrive in {countryName}. However, you don't have to use your data plan for {countryName} as soon as you buy it — you can wait for up to 30 days to get to the country. If you haven't activated the eSIM plan within 30 days, it will automatically activate and eventually expire.

faqs.question: Can I use a hotspot to share the data from my {countryName} eSIM?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can share as much of your Simfinity eSIM data for {countryName} through a hotspot as you want! Simfinity offers unlimited hotspot sharing for all your cellular data plans, whereas many competing eSIM services have a cap for hotspot sharing.

faqs.question: What will happen to my phone number when I get a Simfinity eSIM plan for {countryName}?
faqs.answer: Simfinity offers data-only {countryName} eSIM plans, so your phone number will not change and you will not receive a local phone number. However, you can use online apps like WhatsApp, Messenger, or Signal to reach people back home with your data plan.

faqs.question: What is the best eSIM for {countryName} ?
faqs.answer: Deciding what the best eSIM for {countryName} is comes down to your budget, the length of your trip, and whether you're looking for additional perks in an eSIM app. Simfinity offers competitive rates, reliable internet access, automatic plan activation, an option for auto top-ups, and unique security features that help keep your data usage down. Whether you're vacationing by the beach or traveling for business in {countryName}, you can download the Simfinity eSIM app and find a plan that works best for your trip!
